body.name: Globe Electric 62000009 32" Multi-Joint Desk Lamp with Metal Clamp, Matte Black, Antique Brass Accents, On/Off Rotary Switch on Shade, Partially Adjustable Swing Arm, Home Décor, Office Accessory

features: REFINED INDUSTRIAL DESIGN: with an industrial structure and mechanical elements, the 32" Multi-Joint Desk Lamp is at the peak of a true classic design and will complement all décor
VARIABLE MOUNTING: the metal clamp feature on this 32-inch multi-joint desk lamp means you can mount this light on any surface that’s up to 2-inches wide – ideal for any workstation
BULB REQUIREMENTS: this bright and ultra-modern desk light requires 1x E26/Medium Base 60W Bulb (sold separately) – compatible with LED and Incandescent Bulbs
ADJUSTABLE: the adjustable, spring loaded, top portion of the body allows you to point the light in the direction you need it most making this functional, minimalist design ideal for any office setup
ON/OFF SWITCH: the on and off rotary switch featured on this stunning swing arm desk lamp is conveniently located on the top of the home office lighting shade for quick and easy access
body.description: The Globe Electric 32" Multi-Joint Desk Lamp with Metal Clamp Base is an ideal option for any desk lighting. The upper spring-loaded swing arm is easily adjustable to direct light wherever you need it the most while the metal clamp is perfect to mount on study tables, workstations, or home office desks. The bottom half of the body is nonadjustable and is beautifully designed with a decorative spring. A six-foot cord allows you the ability to place your light anywhere you want regardless of where your wall socket is located, while the on/off switch is conveniently located at the top of the lamp for quick and easy use. This light fixture requires one 60W max E26 base bulb (sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, works well, I bought two over time
reviews.reviewText: I bought one maybe a year or so ago. Works great. Easy mobility, easy to install, etc. Quality for price was great, so much so, that I just bought another one for an additional reading area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best swing lamps
reviews.reviewText: It's difficult to find a well-reviewed swing lamp in this price range, but I love this one.First, the clamp to hold to a surface is robust, all metal, strong, and opens up to 2.5 inches.Next the 'arms' are about 15" each, so you've got a good distance to work with, and they hold position easily. Next, the shade (which is removable) mounts firmly to the socket, and covers a normal E26 bulb so there's no glare side-to-side. The only slight negative is it's not "locked" into the clamp, so when repositioning it, you'll need to be careful about that. But given its other strengths, this is still the lamp I was looking for.Edit: Note this review is for the Globe 56963 Black lamp. Reviews for several different Globe lamps have been merged here -- the ones with plastic clamps are not as good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lamp as 'used-acceptable.' It was certainly that. There was damage to the box as expected and some markings on the lamp's base. I was amazed that there was no real damage to the lamp itself. The light cover was slightly bent and could be bent back to fit. Once I put it together and cleaned the markings off the base of the lamp as well as I could, it looks practically brand new and works perfectly. I love it!!Definitely happy that I skipped the full price version for this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dependable and gives you the option for different lighting.
reviews.reviewText: I had one of those switches on the cord and LEDs that you could change brightness and color. Any time you have a switch on a cord you can expect the the wire going in or out of the switch to fail and it did. Plus it is not convenient to turn it off and because you have to trace the switch following the wire.I purchase this unit specifically because the switch was on the top where I could always find it fast. That and the fact that I could put what ever extra high wattage lamp I wanted into the socket.I like this lamp except for one thing. The lamps reflector sort of screws on. It is only a fraction of turn thread with a dimple on the base holding it on. Look at it wrong and it falls off. A little glue took care of that problem. Faced with this lamp or a switch on a cord lamp I would take this one any day. Also, make sure the bulb you use is not so heavy that the lamp can't hold it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent lamp for price
reviews.reviewText: The lamp feels sturdy enough, and assembly was easy. I'm sure my plants would give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Buy This Garbage.
reviews.reviewText: SYNOPSISThis lamp should be evaluated based on the two distinct functions it needs to serve: (a) provide a secure clamp onto a surface; and (b) provide stable adjustable lighting angles. This garbage singularly fails at both of these criteria. AVOID THIS ITEM.DETAILEDDifficulty Level - How Hard Was This To Use?[_] Beginner[_] Novice[_] Competent[_] Advanced[x] ExpertI had to fight with the crappy clamp for over an hour to get it to provide a SEMI-secure hold. The bell cap on the screw-tight portion of the clamp is cheap and thin metal, which is not SECURED to the clamp! It comes off easily, and that means that the part that is supposed to create a secure hold FALLS OFF when you screw.Build Quality[x] This felt very poorly designed, and I recommend against buying it.[_] This felt poorly designed, but "your mileage may vary."[_] This felt like it was adequately designed, with no big pros or cons.[_] This felt like it was well designed, with more pros than alternatives.[_] This felt like it was excellently designed, and I recommend buying it.Build Materials[x] This felt like it was made of different materials than promised, and I warn against it.[_] This felt like it was made of very cheap materials, and I would not recommend it.[_] This felt like it was made of the promised materials, with no big pros or cons.[_] This felt like it was made of higher quality materials, with more pros than alternatives.[_] This felt like it was made of premium materials, and I recommend buying it.Build Safety[_] This felt very unsafe to use, and I recommend against buying it.[x] This felt a little unsafe to use, but "your mileage may vary."[_] This felt safe enough to use, but nothing to write home about.[_] This felt safe to use, with better performance than alternatives.[_] This felt very safe to use, and I recommend buying itFunctionality[x] This did not do what it promised, and I recommend against buying it.[_] This did what it promised, but very badly.[_] This did what it promised, but it was "just fine."[_] This did what it promised, and did it better than alternatives.[_] This did what it promised, with distinction, and I recommend buying it.This was one of the worst purchases I have ever made. I absolutely and completely regret buying this item and I warn you that this is going to disappoint you too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not come with Bulb
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great Lamp, it’s exactly what I needed, you only need an inch for the clamp and I will probably buy a couple more.Only hang up is there is no bulb included which does hurt the value, but it’s metal, it has a full metal clamp that is easy to adjust and is a nice reading light.Bulb size on the manual is E26

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: Bought one last year for my office desk, easy install and it works great!Just bought three more for my office staff and they love them. Buy it!
The switch is on the cord, would have preferred it to be on the lamp.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not bad, but could be better.
reviews.reviewText: All in all, it's a good lamp. The clamp is solid, and the lamp arms hold reasonably well, materials are acceptable for what you're paying, and it takes a standard lightbulb (not included).My only real critique is where the lamp base interfaces with the table clamp, it's a loose sloppy fit. There's about 3mm of slop (.118") so, if you ned the lamp to be in a precise position, this may not be the lamp for you.
Muy buena lámpara se la compre a mi novia para la aplicación de uñas , y esta encantada con la cantidad de luz que echa , muy práctica y siemore se queda fija donde la pongas

I had worries that it's not sturdy enough, you know, nowadays most products have an "optimized" mount mechanism but this one works unexpectedly well as my every day desk lamp. I have 150cm desk and it's mounted on the far left side and it works well for me sitting at the right side of the desk. I have to say that I type, not write. For writing you may want to mount it closer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good desk lamp overall, not good if ur looking for something modern.
reviews.reviewText: You can't adjust the brightness and its mobility is limited compared to modern LED desk lamp. However, I love its classic look and high brightness.
